Trophy.Title: Eternal Light
Trophy.Description: Proof of a true master who has excelled in all things and has collected all possible trophies.

Trophy.Title: The Savior's Descent
Trophy.Description: Proof of one who has mastered the basics of this world and begun a great journey.

Trophy.Title: The Hope of a Promise
Trophy.Description: Proof of one who has seen through the dark mysteries that lurked in Luxerion, bringing justice.

Trophy.Title: Hope at the Edge of Despair
Trophy.Description: Proof of one who has stood upon the stage in glittering Yusnaan, bringing peace to the Patron.

Trophy.Title: The Mystery of the Holy Clavis
Trophy.Description: Proof of one who has made it through the Dead Dunes to find ancient treasure.

Trophy.Title: An Appetite for Chaos
Trophy.Description: Proof of one who has visited the temple that towers over the Wildlands and touched the great Chaos.

Trophy.Title: A Legend from Times Past
Trophy.Description: Proof of the true savior, who overthrew even the god of light to lead the people to a new world.

Trophy.Title: Beyond Thirteen
Trophy.Description: Proof of making the impossible possible by using Eradia to bring the world a 14th day.

Trophy.Title: A Father, a Son, and a Chocobo
Trophy.Description: Proof of helping a father and son reunite, bringing back a smile that seemed long lost.

Trophy.Title: Deliverer of Salvation
Trophy.Description: Proof of clearing 5 side quests. It is a fine beginning, but the journey is still long.

Trophy.Title: Angel of Salvation
Trophy.Description: Proof of clearing 25 side quests. It is a great feat to lead so many souls to salvation.

Trophy.Title: The Chocobo's Savior
Trophy.Description: Proof of nursing the holy chocobo back to full health among the rich pastures of the Wildlands.

Trophy.Title: Lizard Lariat
Trophy.Description: Proof of hunting down more than 30 lizards in the shifting sands of the Dead Dunes.

Trophy.Title: Crimson Rebirth
Trophy.Description: Proof of restoring a sword, once broken, to its former glory and power.

Trophy.Title: Queen of the Arena
Trophy.Description: Proof of achieving victory in the lists of the Battle Arena 10 times.

Trophy.Title: Seed Collector
Trophy.Description: Proof of a brave warrior who has managed to claim 50 soul seeds from the Chaos.

Trophy.Title: Perfect Passenger
Trophy.Description: Proof of riding upon all of the great monorail lines that cross this shrinking world.

Trophy.Title: Globetrotter
Trophy.Description: Proof of building strong bridges to span the depths between continents, making all the world one.

Trophy.Title: A Helping Hand
Trophy.Description: Proof of clearing 25 quests that have appeared writ on the Canvas of Prayers.

Trophy.Title: Novice Swordsmith
Trophy.Description: Proof of improving your first weapon. Did you make something worthy?

Trophy.Title: Novice Shieldsmith
Trophy.Description: Proof of improving your first shield. Use it wisely to guard yourself.

Trophy.Title: Novice Synthesist
Trophy.Description: Proof of synthesizing your first ability. Did it prove useful?

Trophy.Title: Novice Craftsman
Trophy.Description: Proof of upgrading your first accessory. Did you find the experience thrilling?

Trophy.Title: Novice Stylist
Trophy.Description: Proof of customizing your first schema. Continue on this path to find your own style.

Trophy.Title: Novice Artist
Trophy.Description: Proof of customizing the color of one of your garb. Let your true colors shine through.

Trophy.Title: Expert Swordsmith
Trophy.Description: Proof of modifying weapons 30 times.

Trophy.Title: Expert Shieldsmith
Trophy.Description: Proof of modifying shields 30 times.

Trophy.Title: Expert Synthesist
Trophy.Description: Proof of synthesizing abilities 30 times.

Trophy.Title: Expert Craftsman
Trophy.Description: Proof of upgrading accessories 30 times.

Trophy.Title: Expert Stylist
Trophy.Description: Proof of obtaining 30 different garb.

Trophy.Title: Unearthly Apothecary
Trophy.Description: Proof of obtaining an elixir. It's so rare that it seems almost a waste to use it, doesn't it?

Trophy.Title: Holy Garb of Destruction
Trophy.Description: Proof of obtaining the ultimate garb, imbued with destructive magic.

Trophy.Title: Monster Bane
Trophy.Description: Proof of mastering all creation and conquering even the Ultimate Lair.

Trophy.Title: Desert Dragonslayer
Trophy.Description: Proof of victory over the dragon Aeronite who brought terror to the Dead Dunes.

Trophy.Title: Hero of Might
Trophy.Description: Proof of victory over 100 foes in battle.

Trophy.Title: Hero of Glory
Trophy.Description: Proof of victory over 300 foes in battle.

Trophy.Title: Hero of Legend
Trophy.Description: Proof of victory over 500 foes in battle.

Trophy.Title: Fatal Impact
Trophy.Description: Proof of dealing damage so great that it goes beyond all reason or expectation.

Trophy.Title: Seeing Stars
Trophy.Description: Proof of staggering enemies 50 times with fearsome attacks. Do not ever let them rest!

Trophy.Title: Miracle of Light
Trophy.Description: Proof of one who has used 50 EP.

Trophy.Title: Perfect Timing
Trophy.Description: Proof of successfully guarding against an enemy's attack with perfect timing.

Trophy.Title: Harbinger of Death
Trophy.Description: Proof of defeating your first Last One, the final specimen of a species on the verge of extinction.

Trophy.Title: Goddess of Death
Trophy.Description: Proof of defeating 10 Last Ones, exterminating forever 10 different species of monster.
